name: The Girl With The Gray Hair Awakens
name_original: The Girl With The Gray Hair Awakens
description:
Available as download on PC, Mac, Linux.

The Girl With The Gray Hair Awakens "A girl wakes up in a strange room, unsure of who she is... Play multiple times to uncover the full story!"

An atmospheric VN inspired by flash fiction and short stories that changes everytime you play! Made in 48 hours (and a little more...) as a "flash gamedev" challenge!

Credits:

  • Writing, Art and Programming - Heiden
  • Assorted Music -
    • SERORI, MilkPink, sakunoken
  • SFX - 
    • Jason Lewis - Mind Amend, MalitiaArmy, Audio Productions
  • Select textures by Freepik.com

To My First Time Players:

Due to the time restraints, I didn't have any beta testers for this game. If you spot any TYPOS or GAME BREAKING BUGS , please let me know!  Thank you so much for checking out my game!!
